name: Acht
description:
You have been turned into a spider. Find out what has happened - and survive!

Description
"Acht" is a text-based exploration game set in the 1980s. It is a home-crawler adventure where you control a little spider by clicking on decisions. For players who might suffer from arachnophobia: The only graphical spiders in this game are the ones in the title bar and the logo.

Development
Started in January 2020 as a first experiment with Twine

Credits
Writing, scripting, graphics: Wiebke Scholz (aka Hexenwerk)

Sounds from freesound.org:
Spider Speech: Freed (CC BY 3.0)
Tape Recorder: Pogotron (Sampling+)
Creaking Floor: LisaStocktonWilson (CC BY 3.0)
Bug's steps: Hawkeye_Sprout (CC BY 3.0)
OldClock: anvil278 ( CC0 1.0)
80s geist: LogicMoon (CC BY-NC 3.0)
OHC 375 - Spider Web: aptbr (CC0 1.0)
"Reward" MusicTrack: frankum (CC BY 3.0)
